# 1ã€æ¦‚è¿°

å·¥å…·ç±» å°±æ˜¯å°è£…å¹³å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦ä½ é‡å¤é€ è½®å­ï¼ŒèŠ‚çœå¼€å‘äººå‘˜æ—¶é—´ï¼Œæé«˜å·¥ä½œæ•ˆç‡ã€‚Googleä½œä¸ºå¤§å…¬å¸ï¼Œå½“ç„¶ä¼šä»æ—¥å¸¸çš„å·¥ä½œä¸­æå–ä¸­å¾ˆå¤šé«˜æ•ˆç‡çš„æ–¹æ³•å‡ºæ¥ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å°±è¯ç”Ÿäº†guavaã€‚

# 2.2 å°†Stringè½¬æ¢ä¸ºç‰¹å®šçš„é›†åˆ

//listä¸º  [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]

å¦‚æœ

str="1-2-3-4- 5-  6  ";


guavaè¿˜å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ omitEmptyStrings().trimResults() å»é™¤ç©ºä¸²ä¸ç©ºæ ¼

String str = "1-2-3-4-  5-  6   ";  
List<String> list = Splitter.on("-").omitEmptyStrings().trimResults().splitToList(str);
System.out.println(list);

# 2.4 guavaè¿˜æ”¯æŒå¤šä¸ªå­—ç¬¦åˆ‡å‰²ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ç‰¹å®šçš„æ­£åˆ™åˆ†éš”

å…³äºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„æ“ä½œ éƒ½æ˜¯åœ¨Splitterè¿™ä¸ªç±»ä¸Šè¿›è¡Œçš„

// åˆ¤æ–­åŒ¹é…ç»“æœ

// ä¿ç•™æ•°å­—æ–‡æœ¬  CharMatcher.digit() å·²è¿‡æ—¶   retain ä¿ç•™
//String s1 = CharMatcher.digit().retainFrom("abc 123 efg"); //123

// åˆ é™¤æ•°å­—æ–‡æœ¬  remove åˆ é™¤
// String s2 = CharMatcher.digit().removeFrom("abc 123 efg");    //abc  efg
String s2 = CharMatcher.inRange('0', '9').removeFrom("abc 123 efg"); // abc  efg

# 2.5 é›†åˆçš„è¿‡æ»¤

æˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹äºé›†åˆçš„è¿‡æ»¤ï¼Œæ€è·¯å°±æ˜¯è¿­ä»£ï¼Œç„¶åå†å…·ä½“å¯¹æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œè¿™æ ·çš„ä»£ç æ”¾åœ¨ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œéš¾å…ä¼šæ˜¾å¾—å¾ˆè‡ƒè‚¿ï¼Œè™½ç„¶åŠŸèƒ½éƒ½æœ‰ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¾ˆä¸å¥½çœ‹ã€‚

//æŒ‰ç…§æ¡ä»¶è¿‡æ»¤
ImmutableList<String> names = ImmutableList.of("begin", "code", "Guava", "Java");
Iterable<String> fitered = Iterables.filter(names, Predicates.or(Predicates.equalTo("Guava"), Predicates.equalTo("Java")));
System.out.println(fitered); // [Guava, Java]

//è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿‡æ»¤æ¡ä»¶   ä½¿ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•å¯¹Mapçš„æ¯ä¸ªValueè¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œ
ImmutableMap<String, Integer> m = ImmutableMap.of("begin", 12, "code", 15);
        // Function<F, T> Fè¡¨ç¤ºapply()æ–¹æ³•inputçš„ç±»å‹ï¼ŒTè¡¨ç¤ºapply()æ–¹æ³•è¿”å›ç±»å‹
        Map<String, Integer> m2 = Maps.transformValues(m, new Function<Integer, Integer>() {
            public Integer apply(Integer input) {
            	if(input>12){
            		return input;
            	}else{
            		return input+1;
            	}
            }
        });
System.out.println(m2);   //{begin=13, code=15}

setçš„äº¤é›†, å¹¶é›†, å·®é›†

HashSet setA = newHashSet(1, 2, 3, 4, 5);  
HashSet setB = newHashSet(4, 5, 6, 7, 8);  
   
SetView union = Sets.union(setA, setB);    
System.out.println("union:");  
for (Integer integer : union)  
    System.out.println(integer);           //union å¹¶é›†:1 2 3 4 5 8 6 7
   
SetView difference = Sets.difference(setA, setB);  
System.out.println("difference:");  
for (Integer integer : difference)  
    System.out.println(integer);        //difference å·®é›†:1 2 3
   
SetView intersection = Sets.intersection(setA, setB);  
System.out.println("intersection:");  
for (Integer integer : intersection)  
    System.out.println(integer);  //intersection äº¤é›†:4 5


mapçš„äº¤é›†ï¼Œå¹¶é›†ï¼Œå·®é›†

HashMap<String, Integer> mapA = Maps.newHashMap();
mapA.put("a", 1);mapA.put("b", 2);mapA.put("c", 3);
HashMap<String, Integer> mapB = Maps.newHashMap();
mapB.put("b", 20);mapB.put("c", 3);mapB.put("d", 4);
MapDifference differenceMap = Maps.difference(mapA, mapB);
differenceMap.areEqual();
Map entriesDiffering = differenceMap.entriesDiffering();
Map entriesOnlyLeft = differenceMap.entriesOnlyOnLeft();
Map entriesOnlyRight = differenceMap.entriesOnlyOnRight();
Map entriesInCommon = differenceMap.entriesInCommon();

System.out.println(entriesDiffering);   // {b=(2, 20)}
System.out.println(entriesOnlyLeft);    // {a=1}
System.out.println(entriesOnlyRight);   // {d=4}
System.out.println(entriesInCommon);    // {c=3}

å¤åˆ¶ä»£ç 


å…å»äº†å¾ˆå¤šéº»çƒ¦ï¼å¹¶ä¸”ä¼šä½¿ä½ çš„ä»£ç çœ‹ä¸Šå»æ›´å¥½çœ‹ã€‚è€Œä¸æ˜¯ä»£ç é‡Œé¢å……æ–¥ç€ !=nullï¼Œ !=""
æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º,ä¸ä»…ä»…æ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç±»å‹ï¼Œå…¶ä»–ç±»å‹çš„åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå…¨éƒ¨éƒ½å°è£…åœ¨ Preconditionsç±»é‡Œï¼Œé‡Œé¢çš„æ–¹æ³•å…¨ä¸ºé™æ€ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•çš„æºç 

@CanIgnoreReturnValue
public static <T> T checkNotNull(T reference) {
    if (reference == null) {
      throw new NullPointerException();
    }
    return reference;
}

æ–¹æ³•å£°æ˜ï¼ˆä¸åŒ…æ‹¬é¢å¤–å‚æ•°ï¼‰æè¿°æ£€æŸ¥å¤±è´¥æ—¶æŠ›å‡ºçš„å¼‚å¸¸
checkArgument(boolean)æ£€æŸ¥booleanæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºtrueï¼Œç”¨æ¥æ£€æŸ¥ä¼ é€’ç»™æ–¹æ³•çš„å‚æ•°ã€‚IllegalArgumentException
checkNotNull(T)æ£€æŸ¥valueæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºnullï¼Œè¯¥æ–¹æ³•ç›´æ¥è¿”å›valueï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ä»¥å†…åµŒä½¿ç”¨checkNotNullã€‚NullPointerException
checkState(boolean)ç”¨æ¥æ£€æŸ¥å¯¹è±¡çš„æŸäº›çŠ¶æ€ã€‚IllegalStateException
checkElementIndex(int index, int size)æ£€æŸ¥indexä½œä¸ºç´¢å¼•å€¼å¯¹æŸä¸ªåˆ—è¡¨ã€å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æˆ–æ•°ç»„æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•ˆã€‚ index > 0 && index < sizeIndexOutOfBoundsException
checkPositionIndexes(int start, int end, int size)æ£€æŸ¥[start,end]è¡¨ç¤ºçš„ä½ç½®èŒƒå›´å¯¹æŸä¸ªåˆ—è¡¨ã€å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æˆ–æ•°ç»„æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•ˆIndexOutOfBoundsException

# 2.7 MoreObjects

è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•æ˜¯åœ¨Objectsè¿‡æœŸåå®˜æ–¹æ¨èä½¿ç”¨çš„æ›¿ä»£å“ï¼Œè¯¥ç±»æœ€å¤§çš„å¥½å¤„å°±æ˜¯ä¸ç”¨å¤§é‡çš„é‡å†™ toStringï¼Œç”¨ä¸€ç§å¾ˆä¼˜é›…çš„æ–¹å¼å®ç°é‡å†™ï¼Œæˆ–è€…åœ¨æŸä¸ªåœºæ™¯å®šåˆ¶ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

# 2.8 å¼ºå¤§çš„Orderingæ’åºå™¨

æ’åºå™¨[Ordering]æ˜¯Guavaæµç•…é£æ ¼æ¯”è¾ƒå™¨[Comparator]çš„å®ç°ï¼Œå®ƒå¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥ä¸ºæ„å»ºå¤æ‚çš„æ¯”è¾ƒå™¨ï¼Œä»¥å®Œæˆé›†åˆæ’åºçš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

natural()	å¯¹å¯æ’åºç±»å‹åšè‡ªç„¶æ’åºï¼Œå¦‚æ•°å­—æŒ‰å¤§å°ï¼Œæ—¥æœŸæŒ‰å…ˆåæ’åº
usingToString()	æŒ‰å¯¹è±¡çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å½¢å¼åšå­—å…¸æ’åº[lexicographical ordering]
from(Comparator)	æŠŠç»™å®šçš„Comparatorè½¬åŒ–ä¸ºæ’åºå™¨
reverse()	è·å–è¯­ä¹‰ç›¸åçš„æ’åºå™¨
nullsFirst()	ä½¿ç”¨å½“å‰æ’åºå™¨ï¼Œä½†é¢å¤–æŠŠnullå€¼æ’åˆ°æœ€å‰é¢ã€‚
nullsLast()	ä½¿ç”¨å½“å‰æ’åºå™¨ï¼Œä½†é¢å¤–æŠŠnullå€¼æ’åˆ°æœ€åé¢ã€‚
compound(Comparator)	åˆæˆå¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”è¾ƒå™¨ï¼Œä»¥å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ’åºå™¨ä¸­çš„ç›¸ç­‰æƒ…å†µã€‚
lexicographical()	åŸºäºå¤„ç†ç±»å‹Tçš„æ’åºå™¨ï¼Œè¿”å›è¯¥ç±»å‹çš„å¯è¿­ä»£å¯¹è±¡Iterable<T>çš„æ’åºå™¨ã€‚
onResultOf(Function)	å¯¹é›†åˆä¸­å…ƒç´ è°ƒç”¨Functionï¼Œå†æŒ‰è¿”å›å€¼ç”¨å½“å‰æ’åºå™¨æ’åºã€‚


Person person = new Person("aa",14);  //String name  ,Integer age
Person ps = new Person("bb",13);
Ordering<Person> byOrdering = Ordering.natural().nullsFirst().onResultOf(new Function<Person,String>(){
	public String apply(Person person){
		return person.age.toString();
	}
});
byOrdering.compare(person, ps);
System.out.println(byOrdering.compare(person, ps)); //1      personçš„å¹´é¾„æ¯”pså¤§ æ‰€ä»¥è¾“å‡º1

# 2.11 guavaç¼“å­˜

guavaçš„ç¼“å­˜è®¾è®¡çš„æ¯”è¾ƒå·§å¦™ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¾ˆç²¾å·§çš„ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚guavaç¼“å­˜åˆ›å»ºåˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ç§ï¼Œä¸€ç§æ˜¯CacheLoader,å¦ä¸€ç§åˆ™æ˜¯callbackæ–¹å¼
CacheLoader:

LoadingCache<String,String> cahceBuilder=CacheBuilder
		        .newBuilder()
		        .build(new CacheLoader<String, String>(){
		            @Override
		            public String load(String key) throws Exception {        
		                String strProValue="hello "+key+"!";                
		                return strProValue;
		            }
		        });        
System.out.println(cahceBuilder.apply("begincode"));  //hello begincode!
System.out.println(cahceBuilder.get("begincode")); //hello begincode!
System.out.println(cahceBuilder.get("wen")); //hello wen!
System.out.println(cahceBuilder.apply("wen")); //hello wen!
System.out.println(cahceBuilder.apply("da"));//hello da!
cahceBuilder.put("begin", "code");
System.out.println(cahceBuilder.get("begin")); //code

apiä¸­å·²ç»æŠŠapplyå£°æ˜ä¸ºè¿‡æœŸï¼Œå£°æ˜ä¸­æ¨èä½¿ç”¨getæ–¹æ³•è·å–å€¼ callbackæ–¹å¼:

Cache<String, String> cache = CacheBuilder.newBuilder().maximumSize(1000).build();  
	        String resultVal = cache.get("code", new Callable<String>() {  
	            public String call() {  
	                String strProValue="begin "+"code"+"!";                
	                return strProValue;
	            }  
	        });  
 System.out.println("value : " + resultVal); //value : begin code!
